import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../Ui/Navbar' function CompanySetup() { const [input, setInput] = useState({ name:"", location:"", website:"", logo:null, description:"" }); const handleChange =(e)=>{ setInput({...input, [e.target.name]:e.terget.value}) } const handleFile =(e)=>{ const file = e.target.files?.[0] setInput({...input, file}); } const handleSubmit = async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console } return (
Update Compnay data
) } export default CompanySetup
